mapper.insert:
insert into landing.if_service_request_ws_wf_accessory( par_row_id , created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by , accessory , accessoryPrice )values
( #{rowId} , now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' , #{item.accessory} , #{item.accessoryPrice} )
mapper.select: select row_id as protocalResult from process.testdrivehistory__c where external_id__c = cast(#{rowId} as text)
select row_id as protocalResult from process.quotehistory__c where external_id__c = cast(#{rowId} as text)
select row_id as protocalResult from process.case where external__c = cast(#{rowId} as text)
select protocol__c as protocolID from process.service_request where external_id__c = CAST(#{rowId} AS TEXT)
